page.title: 03FAMILY LIFE FOR ROSALIND
page.content: { MY DAD}USED TO GO AWAY TO WORK IN HAVANT EARLY EVERY MONDAY MORNING AND THEN COME BACK ON FRIDAY EVENING. NOW HE WILL BE COMING HOME EVERY EVENING FROM LEWES. HE TEACHES STUDENTS.{MY MUM}IS DOING A JOB IN A SHOP WHERE PEOPLE GO FOR NEW GLASSES BECAUSE ONE OF HER FRIENDS IS GOING INTO HOSPITAL AND CAN'T WORK. MUM IS USUALLY A HOUSEWIFE AND SHE RUNS THE BROWNIES. I AM A BROWNIE. IN OUR HOUSE{MY BROTHERS,}CLIVE AND ADAM SHARE A BEDROOM. I SHARE WITH{MY {SISTER,}SYLVIA WHO IS SIX.CLIVE,SYLVIA AND I GO TO SCHOOL AND ADAM WILL START SOON. WE ARE LEARNING THE PIANO. ON SATURDAYS WE GO SHOPPING TOGETHER AND SOMETIMES WE GO TO VISIT{MY NAN WHO LIVES IN READING. WE HAVE A DORMOBILE AND WE GO CAMPING IN THE SUMMER. .
